archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.9.4h: h) disabling or revoking identities in a timely manner if they are no longer required (e.g. if the user linked to the identity has changed roles or left the organisation).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
